name: Mycelium (marcoDev)
description:
Mycelium was created as an entry for Global Game Jam 2022!

_____________________________________________________________

CONTROL:

[WASD] Movement

[SPACE]  Activate/Deactivate Light

[L. Mouse Click] Blast

_____________________________________________________________

Hello little creature, your goal is to walk the various laboratory plates avoiding being touched by other creatures very similar to you.

Remember you have a power they don't have!

The game includes 8 levels!

_____________________________________________________________
